REUTERS.TEXT: CORRECTION - PERRY DRUG <PDS> NAMES PRESIDENT In New York story headlined "Perry Drug Stores <PDS> names new president," the position of the David Shwartz should read president and chief operating officer instead of president and chief executive officer. (corrects position of Schwartz) Reuter
